aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on the allowed set of values for each of the tags

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters actions based on tag-value associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters actions based on the presence of mandatory tags in the request

cloudwatch:AlarmActions.description: Filters actions based on defined alarm actions

cloudwatch:namespace.description: Filters actions based on the presence of optional namespace values

cloudwatch:requestInsightRuleLogGroups.description: Filters actions based on the Log Groups specified in an Insight Rule

cloudwatch:requestManagedResourceARNs.description: Filters access by the Resource ARNs specified in a managed Insight Rule
